Reviews.Content: partner stayed formule 1 night prior morning flight chosen purely based cheapest hotel close airport didnt expect fancy expectations surpassed time id stayed formule 1 comparison private hostel clean contained double bed single bunk bed top bed wasnt – soft worn slept fine id imagine pretty cramped people dont hang desk chair set laptop write tv bathroom spartan set shower cubicle annoying curtain floor soaked shower shower sit toiletries forcing close curtain grab stuff sink soaking checkin free checkout domestic terminal approx 5 minutes walk hotel walk isnt completely undercover raining catch cab airport shuttles comes hotel caught shuttle hotel international terminal 6 person left 10 minutes scheduled time telling 10 minutes prior schedule meaning stood front 20 minutes hotels fault means allow extra time plan shuttle overall fine – bed shower close airport
